website_summaries.verdict: A premium bottle opener that is easy to grip and offers unparalleled quality.
pros: Equipped with an anti-slip silicon coating that ensures you can maintain a firm grip on the bottle opener at all times
Hanging loops enable you to hang the bottle opener just about anywhere
Simple to clean with warm water and soap
cons: Much heavier than comparable bottle openers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very pretty
customer_reviews.text: My friend lost her bottle opener out of a bar set she was gifted. While this was just a little too big to fit in her holder, it is better quality than the one she just. She was so happy with the replacement I surprised her with. It's a nice bottle opener. I might order myself one too
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Used this for over a year it feels like - Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I drink at home on the computer most of the time... and i go through at least 10 bottles a day, this thing is still holding up and works amazing... nothing out there like it (on amazn at least)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: For those who stay with what they know
customer_reviews.text: i love these bottle openers. I hate twist tops. These heavy duty and yet attractive bottle openers take me back to when I was a kid and had to ask dad or mom to open a bottle for me. Love em.
customer_reviews.author: David Hutton

customer_reviews.title: knuckle saver
customer_reviews.text: We have started drinking bottled sodas, and this has been a knuckle saver for us. Right length to keep your fingers safe, good weight, and nice grip keeps it steady and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Genni

customer_reviews.title: If you like beer but have stubborn bottle caps! This is your product!
customer_reviews.text: They have opened every bottle of beer I've tried them on. Not one bottle cap survived this opener. With ease and incredible hand comfort those suckers came right off!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Now I can open bottles
customer_reviews.text: The last bottle opener I got from Walter Drake bent, so I was looking for a better bottle opener. I found it - this one is sturdy and works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dantzler

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t always catch the bottle cap well and have to do multiple attempts to open. Better choices available
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Kept one and gave one as a gift. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! What you would expect out of a quality bottle opener. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and work
customer_reviews.text: are what they are but they arrived very quickly, so for that you get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I don't think men would like it but excellent for women
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this bottle opener. It works like a wonder.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto B. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my children as another new home gift.
customer_reviews.author: K Fin

customer_reviews.title: Grip of cap and sturdiness after multiple use
customer_reviews.text: Works well after repeated use. Glad to have bought it
customer_reviews.author: Vibha Goel

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed, handsome and useful tool.
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle opener.Bottle opener side can be a little longer, but great product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality bottle opener. I couldnt be happier, also arrived super fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wait until the last second...
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid in your hand and is nicely made. Unfortunately, you have to be pretty accurate when you put it on the bottle cap or it will just slip off. It would never work for a bartender who needs to work fast, or the very thirsty person who may die if the ice cold beer isn't running down his/her throat immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Opens bottles with metal caps - amazing
customer_reviews.text: This bottle opener is of sturdy quality and has aesthetic appearance. For all practical purposes, it should last a lifetime and could be handed down for generations, or until the end of life as we know it. It performs well in most circumstances but it is not automatic, you actually have to properly place it on the cap, hold the bottle with one hand while lifting up. If it came with instructions, I didn't see them. I also don't listen to the airline cabin crew where they describe how to buckle my seatbelt. I strongly urge people to use this bottle opener rather than to use your teeth. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J Good

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bottle Opener
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be a very nice bottle opener and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The JINRUCHE Heavy Duty Stainless Steel Beer Bottle Opener, Solid Easy to Use Best Bottle Openers, 6 inch, is excellent and a joy to use. I highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Good simple bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, works as expected. I just wanted a plain bottle opener, as we don't use it very often, and this fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Heavy feel, stainless steel. Does the job easily and looks nice, too.

customer_reviews.title: Opens bottles!  Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: It works great. As a bottle-opener should. Even my kids can use it with ease to open their Izze sparkling juice bottles.

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty cool and very well made. Perfect for gatherings and party’s.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. Easy to use and well made. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Quality opener
customer_reviews.text: Well made and moderately heavy. Opens bottles with a snap. Good looks. Sent in clear plastic pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Treetrimmer3

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The tab is too short and slips when I place it under the cap. It can't open anything. I threw it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D'Agostino

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice..
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice...has a nice hefty feel. But the geometry is not quite right. The part that catches on below the bottle cap is too thick and if you're not careful it will slip off.. But a second try will get the cap off. My 40 year old thin metal bottle opener/can opener works better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bartender Bottle Opener, JINRUCHE Heavy Duty Stainless Steel Beer Bottle Opener, Solid Easy to Use Best Bottle Openers, 6 inch (2 Pack)
feature_bullets: MATERIAL – Made out of heavy duty stainless steel. Non-Magnet.
PRACTICAL – Each measures approx. 6" long x 1.8" wide. Great for professional bartenders or home use.

EASY GRIP NON-SLIP RUBBER HANDLES – The non-slip rubberized handles prevent your hands sliding or slipping while opening any beverage bottle. The easy grip Bottle opener feels soft yet secure in your hands.

HANGING HOLES FOR EASY STORAGE – Save tons of space in your kitchen or dorm room; you can store the bottle opener inside any kitchen drawer, so it's tucked away and out of sight. Or, you can hang on the wall using the useful hanging holes in the bottle opener for a direct reach for every time you need to use it.

OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE – Simply contact us and we will be happy to address any of your concerns. We also stand behind our products with a complete, LIFETIME GUARANTEE. If something breaks or if you don't absolutely love your bottle opener, we will take it back and offer a replacement or refund, no questions asked. That is part of our 100% LIFETIME CUSTOMER SATISFACTION GUARANTEE!!!
